original_text: And the king of Israel went out and struck the horses and chariots, and struck the Syrians with a great blow.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 나가서 말과 병거를 치고 또 아람 사람을 쳐서 크게 이겼더라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Israel went out
and struck the horses and chariots
and struck the Syrians with a great blow.
